verbs.description: [ARG1: italian] [ARG1: pineapple] [V: trifle] my grandmother made this rich tempting trifle every year for our family christmas eve celebrations now i make it to carry on her special tradition it an easy delicious no - bake dessert everyone will love —ann - marie milano milton massachusetts
